mapper.select: select dataname, (finaldate-startdate)*60*60*24 as goaldate, goalname, state, detailgoalseq, commentmsg from personaldata p join goal g on p.dataseq=g.dataseq join detailgoal d on g.dataseq = d.dataseq where p.dataseq=#{dataseq}
mapper.update: update detailgoal set state=1 where detailgoalseq=#{detailgoalseq}
